trans-unit.source: Welcome to the PowerShell-Docs repository, housing the official PowerShell documentation <link><linkText>available on MSDN</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to the PowerShell-Docs repository, housing the official PowerShell documentation <link><linkText>available on MSDN</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Note: right now, this repo is only intended for PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) content.
trans-unit.target: Note: right now, this repo is only intended for PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) content.

trans-unit.source: In the future, it may be expanded to include a greater set of PowerShell documentation.
trans-unit.target: In the future, it may be expanded to include a greater set of PowerShell documentation.

trans-unit.source: We will be actively merging contributions into this repository via pull request.
trans-unit.target: We will be actively merging contributions into this repository via pull request.

trans-unit.source: Please note that before contributing, you must <link><linkText>sign a Contribution License Agreement</linkText><title></title></link> to ensure that the community is free to use your contributions.
trans-unit.target: Please note that before contributing, you must <link><linkText>sign a Contribution License Agreement</linkText><title></title></link> to ensure that the community is free to use your contributions.

trans-unit.source: For more information on contributing, read our <link><linkText>contributions guide</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on contributing, read our <link><linkText>contributions guide</linkText><title></title></link>.
